question: Qutub-ud-din Mubarak ruled during which of the following periods?
explanation: Qutub-ud-din Mubarak ruled from 1316 to 1320. He was the son of Ala-ud-din who had escaped destructioin at Kafurs hands. He repeated the harsh regulations of his father, restored the confiscated lands to their owners. He abolished the price control system introduced Ala-ud-din.
